sentences.en: Camels are among the most physiologically resilient creatures on Earth.
sentences.cn: 骆驼是地球上生理适应能力最强的生物之一。

sentences.en: Cartilage's surface is usually resilient and smooth.
sentences.cn: 软骨表面通常是有弹性而且平滑的.
儿童的适应力一般都很强。

sentences.en: Collagen: Drenches skin in moisture and forms intensive and resilient skin.
sentences.cn: 胶原蛋白: 滋润保湿,肌肤紧致有弹力.

sentences.en: Cotton is more resistant to being squashed and polyester is more resilient.
sentences.cn: 棉布更抗压，而涤纶更有弹性。

sentences.en: Driven: directly driven by motor through jaw resilient coupling.
sentences.cn: 传动: 泵通过爪型弹性联轴器,由电动机直接驱动.

sentences.en: George Fraser was clearly a good soldier, calm and resilient.
sentences.cn: 乔治·弗雷泽显然是个好士兵，沉着冷静且适应力强。

sentences.en: Good leather feels soft, is flexible, uniform thickness, good resilient and durable.
sentences.cn: 好的皮手感柔软细腻, 韧性好, 厚度均匀, 弹性佳,耐磨.

sentences.en: He'll get over it—young people are amazingly resilient.
sentences.cn: 他会克服这些的—年轻人的适应力惊人。

sentences.en: Productivity is high . Our economy is flexible . It is resilient.
sentences.cn: 我们的经济是有弹性的,能够恢复到从前那样.

sentences.en: She has resilient character and will soon be cheerful again.
sentences.cn: 她有达观的性格,不久便会振作起来.

sentences.en: The body of the camera makes it highly resilient to outdoor use.
sentences.cn: 这部照相机的机身很适合户外使用.

sentences.en: The company proved remarkably resilient during the recession.
sentences.cn: 公司在经济衰退期间表现出惊人的耐挫力。

sentences.en: The former is backed up by a long and resilient classical tradition.
sentences.cn: 前者有悠久而富有弹性的古典传统作后盾.

sentences.en: The house had a squat, resilient look about it.
sentences.cn: 房子低矮, 但看上去很结实.

sentences.en: The latter can form a coating that is resilient.
sentences.cn: 后一种可形成一种有回弹力的涂层.

trans.tran_cn: 能复原的，弹回的，有弹性的，能立刻恢复精神的，社会渣滓
trans.tran_en: able to become strong, happy, or successful again after a difficult situation or event
